If you or someone you know has been affected by sexual assault or rape, there are resources available to help. The National Sexual Assault Hotline is available 24/7 for support and information, and can be reached at 1-800-656-HOPE (4673).

Remember, sexual assault and rape are never okay, and any form of non-consensual sexual activity is illegal and unethical. Always prioritize and respect the boundaries, autonomy, and consent of all parties involved in any sexual encounter.
